preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 30.0 g of Bismuth Oxide. 
 2. Weigh out 29.7 g of Neodymium Oxide. 
 3. Weigh out 14.1 g of Terbium Oxide. 
 4. Weigh out 0.5 g of Lithium Carbonate. 
 5. Combine all powders in a clean, dry mortar and pestle. 
 6. Grind the mixture thoroughly for 15-20 minutes to ensure a homogeneous blend.
